body.name: Tlsdosp Retro Handheld Game Console with 400 Classical FC Games-3.0 Inches Screen Portable Video Game Consoles with Protective Shell-Handheld Video Games Support for Connecting TV & Two Players (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 29 mins
features: 🎁【400 Super Classic FC Games】This mini retro handheld game console has 400 built-in classic games. The classic FC game allows you to play 400 games without any advertising or additional costs, including Arcade retro games, puzzles, arcades, shooting, racing, fighting, adventure etc. Each game is classical in your childhood. More choice for playing, recall the wonderful childhood memories and have funny game time with kids or friends, You can have a break in the spare time.

🎁【Support 2 Players & Play on TV】 There are extra game controller in the package, support 2 people play games in the same time. Let you have fun playing a two-player game. If you want to enjoy a more lively and exciting video game experience, you also can connect console to the TV so that you can enjoy the funny and lively video game in bigger screen.(NOTE:The controller only functions when in Two-player mode. If the remote cannot be used, please check whether it is used in the correct mode.)

🎁【Mini & Easy to Carry 】This mini retro game console is only 150g. Compact and lightweight handheld video games console, mini body, easy to carry it anywhere, deal with boring time. The perfect choice for enjoying childhood fun in airplanes, camps, travel or on the way to work. You can put it in your pocket or bag, and carry it with you on the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing yourselves.

🎁【1200Ah Rechargeable Battery】Portable Classic Game Console built-in 1200 mAh Rechargeable lithium battery. The mini game console comes with USB cable, charging time is about 1~3 hours, 5~8 hours of continuous game play. which is ideal for frequent business trips, travel, travel, camping. Never worry about running out of battery again.Charge using a 5V1A charger

🎁【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adults】 The retro handheld game console not only bringing funny game time to children but also waking up wonderful childhood memories to the 80s and 90s adults, as well as releasing their life pressure. This handheld video games console for kids is perfect gift choice on Birthday, Christmas and New year festival moments or any occasion. Buy it now to get: (1) Game Console; (2) USB Cable; (3) AV Output Cable; (4) User Manual（5）Storage Bag.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 80s 90s Retro Toys - Retro Handheld Game Console As a gaming fan, handheld games must be an indispensable device. It can make you reflect on the fun of playing games when you were a kid, and enhance your relationship with your family, let you enjoy parent-child time. Whether it's a party or a journey, it's also a form of entertainment.

Where Fun Happens? Tlsdosp Handheld Game Console comes with 400 classic games: Puzzle, Action, Racing, Arcade Retro Games, Logic & Math, Sports, Arcade, Shooting, Fighting Games, Strategy, Adventure, Card Games and ect. There is always one game that you like. Whether you’re at home or on the go, solo or with friends, it is designed to fit your life. It will give you the fantastic gaming experience, relieve your stress from life and work, as well as bring back your wonderful childhood memories. You will like it!

Product advantages Support 2 Players Plug the independent game controller, you can play with your children, brothers & sisters, as well as friends. Share the fun and deep the relationship with each other. Why not? Portable and Elegant Compact and lightweight handheld game console, mini case, take away. 1020mAh battery With the built-in 1020 mAh lithium battery, the working time is 7 to 10 hours. Plugin the USB cable for charging, easy to use. Charging time: about 1 - 2 hours Battery life: about 5 - 6 hours Please note: Do not use a high-powered charging power supply to charge the product, which may lead to heating.
Best Gift for Your Child Maybe you will be pleasantly surprised to find the talent of the nowadays children for playing games is so powerful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THAT THIS COMES WITH A CASE
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful for lovers of old-school gaming. Over 400 games loaded on to this Game Boy styled retro gaming device. We bought 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They just don't work....
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun throwback idea. So we bought 4. And between the controls and the extra controllers and the batteries they just didn't execute well at all. None of the 4 worked as expected. They are cheap and very poor quality. Guess we were expecting too much.If you want this to play super Mario 1 and finish the game in 1 sitting then maybe it's worth buying. but even that didn't work well.Find a better option. They are out there.The game catalog was also very poor. And many of the games repeat in the list. Missing most of the great titles.Avoid this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is a good product.
reviews.reviewText: But smells like smoke while charging the battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars First time little gamer
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited to purchase this for my grandson. So many games and many classics that I played as a kid. The game itself was easy for him to use (6 year old) and perfect hand held size. I also like the fact that it could be hooked up to a television. My grandson had a blast with this. Unfortunately after the battery charge it had when it arrived was gone the game wouldn't charge again. The reason for my 3 star review is because of the battery charging issue, he was only able to enjoy his gift for the short amount of time before it was a useless hunk of plastic. It may have just been that I received a bad one in the bunch because otherwise it would have been great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a great games for kids and adults, I love it and I really recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I turned it on after I got it today and the screen won't work but I heard sound so I used the cords to hook it to my TV and I could see the games but the controller doesn't work. So in order to use this at all I have to hook to a TV and sit super close because the cord is so short without being able to utilize the controller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I’m at shock with how great this handheld is. It’s portable but it can also get hooked up to the tv I have a 75 inch tv and it has no problem or lag the cable to connect to tv is a little short but that’s honestly the only downside. It has a bunch of game that are both muitplayer and solo. Me and my gf had a ton of fun for the price. Great console worth the money.🙂
